string.value: If I lost the Ludibrium Medal, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the Ludibrium Medal. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost Ludibrium Medal from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

Oh no, did you lose the Ludibrium Medal by any chance? That's a rare, precious item, and without that, you won't be able to enter the center of the clocktower. Oh no... well, are you willing to take one more crack at it?
Alright. I may not be blessed with many abilities, so you may need to talk to #bFlo#k, who's in Path of Time.
You don't want to take another crack on the challenge. It's not easy defeating Papulatus.
I also heard from Mr. Bouffon about the medal. I'll give you the one that I'm wearing right now, then.
How do I have this Ludibrium medal? there's a way...there's a way... kind of like magic.
#bFlo#k is at the entrance towards #bWarped Path of Time #k
